TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RijndaelManaged extends System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael
Public NotInheritable Class RijndaelManaged Inherits Rijndael
public ref class RijndaelManaged sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::Rijndael

summary.span: 访问的托管的版本算法。

span.span: Accesses the managed version of the algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此算法支持密钥长度为 128、 192 或 256 位;默认值为 256 位。This algorithm supports key lengths of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 256 bits. 在.NET Framework 中，此算法支持 128、 192 或 256 位; 块的大小默认值为 128 位 (-兼容)。In .NET Framework, this algorithm supports block sizes of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 128 bits (-compatible). 在.NET Core 中，它等同于 AES，并支持 128 位块大小。In .NET Core, it is the same as AES and supports only a 128-bit block size. 算法是前置任务的。The algorithm is the predecessor of . 应使用类而不是。You should use the class instead of . 有关详细信息，请参阅文章[Rijndael 之间的差异和 AES](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) .NET 安全性博客中。For more information, see the entry [The Differences Between Rijndael and AES](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) in the .NET Security blog. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何进行加密和解密使用示例数据`RijndaelManaged`类。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the `RijndaelManaged` class. [!code-cpp[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RijndaelManaged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置加密操作的块大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.

value.span: 块大小，以位为单位的加密操作。

span.span: The block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.
The default is 128 bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 中，Rijndael 的有效的块大小值是 128、 192 和 256 位。In .NET Framework, the valid block size values for Rijndael are 128, 192 and 256 bits. 在.NET Core 中的块大小为 Rijndael 只能是 128 位。In .NET Core, the block size for Rijndael can only be 128 bits. 请参阅有关块大小的详细信息。See the for more information about block size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会解密已加密的邮件使用创建重载具有相同的签名。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature. `rgbkey`大小必须为 128、 192 或 256 位。The `rgbkey` size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法具有相同的签名参数编码的消息进行解密。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to decrypt messages encoded with the same signature parameter.
